Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering! Please see your event details below.
Date: Tuesday, 16 May 2017 {{my.Save the Date London:default=edit me}}
Time: 8.30am - 5.15pm
Location: Pivotal London Office 211 Old Street, London, EC1V 9NR (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/211+Old+St,+London+EC1V+9NR,+UK/@51.5259343,-0.090919,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x48761ca61bf76b2d:0x89c21dcce87fd5a1!8m2!3d51.5259343!4d-0.0887303]]>)
Agenda: Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
***The information below is only for the Data Science Workshop attendees (afternoon session) Workshop Prerequisites:
- Willingness to participate in a demanding, high-intensity training experience - Comfort with data analytic technologies preferred (statistics, mathematics, machine learning, SQL, R, Python)
Workshop Audience:
- Experienced data analysts and data engineers willing to work hard to achieve superior Data Science skills - Anyone else who wants to learn about Data Science using Pivotal software
Laptop Requirements:
- The workshop is a hands-on lab and requires attendees to provide their own laptop - The workshop will be using a cloud cluster. Windows students will need an SSH program installed such as MobaXterm (recommended). MacOS students will need a terminal program such as iTerm (recommended).
Directions Scaffolding obscures sight lines to The Warehouse from the Old Street Roundabout, but if you persevere through the building site, youâ€™ll find us!
Step-by-Step Directions
- Exit Subway 4 from Old Street Tube Station - Walk up the ramp on your left - Immediately in front of you is an advertisement with "Ceviche" and "Maki"; walk past the sign towards a mini courtyard to the right - Our building's revolving doors are on your left - Enter the building, walk down past the coffee shop and you will find the elevators at the end; we are on the 2nd floor
If you have any questions, feel free to email Phil Reay at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
